eventSession.name: hourOfDay
eventSession.description: Session starting hour of the day (values 0 - 23)

eventSession.name: dayOfWeekend
eventSession.description: Race day (1 = Friday, 2 = Saturday, 3 = Sunday) – relevant to the grip and weather simulation.

eventSession.name: timeMultiplier
eventSession.description:
Rate at which the session time advances in realtime.
Values 0, 1, … 24
